author: Giftea
message: fix(curriculum): incorrect spelling of "preferrable" to preferable (#60367)

files.patch:
@@ -43,7 +43,7 @@ This refers to something happening two times within a specified period.
 
 `The team meets twice a week to discuss progress.` â€“ This means the team gathers two times per week to have discussions.
 
-**Important**: `twice a week` clarifies that an event is going to happen two times in the same week. It is preferrable to `biweekly`, since the latter might be understood as happening every two weeks, or twice a month. In this dialog, however, both Sarah and Bob seem to have a common understanding of `biweekly` meaning the same as `twice a week`.
+**Important**: `twice a week` clarifies that an event is going to happen two times in the same week. It is preferable to `biweekly`, since the latter might be understood as happening every two weeks, or twice a month. In this dialog, however, both Sarah and Bob seem to have a common understanding of `biweekly` meaning the same as `twice a week`.
 
 # --scene--
